flawed_nl_solution:
He has 15 months to save $3000 so that's 3000/15 = $<<3000/15=200>>200 a month
He gets paid twice a month so he needs to save 200/2 = $<<200/2=1000>>1000 from each paycheck
#### 1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
